mapper.insert: Insert into PLAN_USE (USE_SQ, START_DATE, END_DATE, MEM_ID, PLAN_SQ) values(plan_use_sq.nextval, sysdate, sysdate+#{planPeriod}, #{memId}, 2)
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM PLAN_USE
where MEM_ID = #{memId} and end_date-sysdate>0

SELECT count(*) FROM PLAN_USE
where MEM_ID = #{memId} and end_date-sysdate>0
mapper.update: UPDATE plan set plan_st = 'N' where plan_sq = #{planSq}
mapper.select: select B.USE_SQ , B.START_DATE , B.END_DATE , B.MEM_ID , B.PLAN_SQ, A.PLAN_NM, A.PLAN_PERIOD, TO_CHAR(B.START_DATE) startDay, TO_CHAR(B.END_DATE) endDay FROM plan A inner join plan_use B on A.plan_sq = B.plan_sq

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM plan A inner join plan_use B on A.plan_sq = B.plan_sq ORDER BY use_sq) a) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{pageIndex} - 1) * #{pageUnit} + 1 AND #{pageIndex} * #{pageUnit}

SELECT count(*) totCnt FROM plan A inner join plan_use B on A.plan_sq = B.plan_sq
AND PLAN_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND MEM_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND START_DATE LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'

SELECT ROWNUM rn, c.* FROM ( SELECT a.plan_nm, COUNT(*) AS useCount FROM plan a, plan_use b WHERE a.plan_sq = b.plan_sq
AND b.start_date BETWEEN to_date(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND ${'sysdate'}
AND b.start_date BETWEEN to_date(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND to_date(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND a.plan_nm LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
GROUP BY a.plan_nm ) c
SELECT COUNT(*) totCnt FROM PLAN_USE WHERE MEM_ID = 'TEST_ID' AND END_DATE > SYSDATE
